bioAsHtml:
Lorin is a Senior Software Engineer on Netflix's Traffic and Chaos Team, where he works on improving reliability of Netflix services by applying Chaos Engineering: conducting experiments on services running in production.

Lorin authored "Ansible: Up and Running" and co-authored "The OpenStack Operations Guide", both published by O'Reilly Press. He has also written numerous journal and conference papers on software engineering.
